Desc.eng: P-Please, don’t shoot! I invoke The Pact Between Man and Monster to Leave Each Other Alone.
My name is... eh, just call me Professor Toad. Everyone does. I’m an archeologist. I’m exploring the ruins of the early vodyanoy civilization.
You must know that the pact was broken.
So I’ve heard! But I trust you still respect it?
Don't worry. And I also need your help. I'm looking for an ancient Inkgate in the swamp.
My friend, you are lucky! I know exactly where it is. Let me show it to you on your map!
So I’ve heard! But I trust you still respect it?
